price: 69 Dis : « Ceux qui forgent des mensonges sur Allah sont voués à la perdition. »
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
